  • Method Details

    • goUp

      public boolean goUp(int nXLimit, int nYLimit)
      This method enables the player to move up. It returns a boolean value true if the player is able to go up and false if they can't.
      Parameters:
      nXLimit - the integer value corresponding to the x-coordinate dimension limit of the Area
      nYLimit - the integer value corresponding to the y-coordinate dimension limit of the Area
      Returns:
      an boolean value if the movement was successful or not.

    • goDown

      public boolean goDown(int nXLimit, int nYLimit)
      This method enables the player to move down. It returns a boolean value true if the player is able to go down and false if they can't
      Parameters:
      nXLimit - the integer value corresponding to the x-coordinate dimension limit of the Area
      nYLimit - the integer value corresponding to the y-coordinate dimension limit of the Area
      Returns:
      an boolean value if the movement was successful or not.

    • goLeft

      public boolean goLeft(int nXLimit, int nYLimit)
      This method enables the player to move left. It returns a boolean value true if the player is able to go left and false if they can't
      Parameters:
      nXLimit - the integer value corresponding to the x-coordinate dimension limit of the Area
      nYLimit - the integer value corresponding to the y-coordinate dimension limit of the Area
      Returns:
      an boolean value if the movement was successful or not.

    • attack

      public void attack(Creature CEnemy, Creature CActiveCreature)
      This method enables the player to attack the enemy using their active creature.
      Parameters:
      CEnemy - an enemy
      CActiveCreature - a creature used by the player

    • catchCreature

      public boolean catchCreature(Creature CEnemy, ArrayList<Creature> aCaptured, Inventory CInventory)
      This method enables the player to catch a creature they encounter in the area. It either successfully captures it or it fails to capture.
      Parameters:
      CEnemy - the creature enemy
      aCaptured - the array list of creatures containing the captured creatures
      CInventory - the inventory
      Returns:
      the success indicator

    • swap

      public boolean swap(ArrayList<Creature> aCaptured, Inventory CInventory)
      This method enables the player to swap creatures when they are in the battle phase It always returns a 0 or 1 to indicate the success of a swap
      Parameters:
      aCaptured - the array list of creatures
      CInventory - the inventory
      Returns:
      the boolean to indicate if it was successful or not

      public int getPosX()
      This method returns the current x-coordinate position of the player

      the x-coordinate position of the player
